Data Fields
pmhalSysConfig Struct Reference

Structure defining the SIDLEMODE definition. These parameters define the properties to configure SIDLEMODE. More...

#include <hw_pmhal_data.h>

Data Fields

uint32_t sysConfigRegAddr
 
uint8_t idleModeShift

uint8_t standbymodeShift
 
uint8_t standbyMode
 
uint8_t sidleMode
 

Detailed Description

Structure defining the SIDLEMODE definition. These parameters define the properties to configure SIDLEMODE.

Field Documentation

uint8_t pmhalSysConfig::idleModeShift

idleMode Shift.

uint8_t pmhalSysConfig::isSClockActivityPresent

presence of SClkActivity.

uint8_t pmhalSysConfig::sidleMode

Bit map indicating the idleModes supported. It can take any of the values from pmhalPrcmModuleSIdleMode_t.

uint8_t pmhalSysConfig::standbyMode

Bit map indicating the standbyMode supported. It can take any of the values from pmhalPrcmModuleMStbyMode_t.

uint8_t pmhalSysConfig::standbymodeShift

standby Shift.

uint32_t pmhalSysConfig::sysConfigRegAddr

Sysconfig register address.
